Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,464,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Frank Tanana (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1985, off Atlee Hammaker (NYG)...
Injured on 8/10/1985 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/1986, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Oakland on 9/6/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1986, hitting .478 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,100,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1987, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,100,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1988, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1988, hitting .360 with 7 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1988, hitting .359 with 11 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1988, hitting .344 with 23 HR, 104 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $7,328,571 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 5/1/1989...
6/18/1989: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $11,250,000 per year, for 4 years.
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 6/21/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Drove in 8 runs against Texas on 7/16/1989...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Kansas City on 8/29/1989...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 9/6/1989...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1989, hitting .365 with 20 HR, 111 RBI...
Injured on 4/15/1990 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1990, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 9/2/1991...
